description.en:
We want to encourage and educate our next generation with a focus on space and the future of humanity. our vision is to provide access to an international community of resource for all things space related.Hyper meteor strives to encourage as many people as possible to look up to the sky and start dreaming of what is possible in the future. We aim to serve out international community by being their source for learning and content about astronomy. Our interactive ecosystem is comprised of platforms dedicated to our ""education through astronomy"" goals. 

Our network includes space charity donations and collaborations with ""The Planetary Society"" , NFT store , expanding eco system of games, our very own token and so much more.
